Literature.Title: Aedesin: structure and antimicrobial activity against multidrug resistant bacterial strains.
Literature.Author: Godreuil S, Leban N, Padilla A, Hamel R, Luplertlop N, Chauffour A, Vittecoq M, Hoh F, Thomas F, Sougakoff W, Lionne C, Yssel H, Missé D

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ESBL (MIC=>32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=>32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii AB1(MIC=>32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=>32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 700802(MIC=>32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=>32µg/ml)
